spec_data.Name: drupal7-views_bulk_operations
spec_data.Description:
This module augments Views by allowing bulk operations to be executed on the
displayed rows. It does so by showing a checkbox in front of each node, and
adding a select box containing operations that can be applied. Drupal Core or
Rules actions can be used.

This package provides the following Drupal modules:
* views_bulk_operations
* actions_permissions
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:24:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides a way of selecting multiple rows and applying operations to them
